thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com | 2 of 64
thread.title: Gary

author: Gary
title: Gary
text:
I found a refurbished cell phone repeater online for a great price.
Website worked well, customer service was readily available, and tech support for a question was excellent.
The cell phone repeater I purchased was in perfect condition and works well.
I can actually use my cell phone reliably at home.
I would (and have) recommended the company to friends.
If you have a weak cell signal, you should consider getting a repeater.
I recommend a refurbished unit, as mine was like new for a discounted price.
